verbs.description: pfizer ceo [V: is] stepping down after 8 years pfizer ceo ian read is stepping down at the end of 2018 ending his eight - year tenure at the head of the pharma giant he 'll be replaced by pfizer chief operating officer albert bourla in january 2019 albert bourla ian read executive chairman ceo pfizer innovative health animal health greece chief operating officer shantanu narayen pfizer lead independent director pfizer headquarters new york 8 years coo technical director
